attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Finds the ideas of independence and freedom somewhat foolish
Sees no value in holding back complaints and concealing emotions
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Values a harmonious existence
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Deeply respects those that work hard at their labors
Is rarely jealous
Is dour as a rule
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Would be deeply satisfied if everyone could live as one in complete harmony
Is extremely confident of herself in situations requiring her skills
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Has a sense of duty
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Strong
Very slow to tire
Quite quick to heal
Rarely sick
Poor focus
Good intuition
A meager kinesthetic sense
